summary.para: The Init method initializes the seeking helper object.

param.name: bSupportRendering
param.para: Boolean value that specifies whether the filter is a renderer. Use the value TRUE if the filter is a renderer, or FALSE otherwise.

param.name: pPin
param.para: Pointer to the interface on the input pin of the filter.

returns.para: Returns one of the following HRESULT values.

description.para: Not enough memory to create the object.

summary.para: The ISeekingPassThru interface creates a helper object that implements seeking for one-input filters. Filters can use this interface to implement the and interfaces. For more information, see CPosPassThru.
Applications do not use this interface.

remarks.para: To obtain this interface, call CoCreateInstance with CLSID_SeekingPassThru. You can also use the CreatePosPassThru function in the base class library.
